feature.name: Privileges for setting configuration parameters
feature.description: Unprivileged users can be [granted permission](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/15/sql-grant.html) to change server variables via [`SET`](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-set.html) and [`ALTER SYSTEM`](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-altersystem.html)
